author: Carnistir
title: Snake Vehicle- Fangpyre Truck
review:
Sure, the concept of Snake People with vehicles is wierd, but this thing is really cool.  The Fangyre Truck has lots of playability.  Now, I will present the review-

Box/Instructions

The box is fairly long, and zooms in on the set a lot.  It makes the set look bigger than it really is.  The instructions are easy-to-follow, and very good, as usual.  8/10

Parts

Great parts!  Fangpyre Staff, Shurikens, a ninja sword, and dynamite comprise the weapons. The ninja's shoulder armor are really cool.  The snake tail, snake heads, and ninja hood pieces are other nice parts.  Also, the tires are great!  9/10

Minifigures

Jay ZX- Jay ZX is very cool, and has a very good color scheme: Blue and Silver.  I like that. Zane ZX- Zane ZX is also cool.  His color scheme is as good as Jay's: White and Gold.  Cool! Fangdam- Fangdam has two heads, which is odd.  His colors are red, white, and black. Fangtom- Fangtom is mostly red, with some white and black.  He has a snake tail and two heads.  10/10       

The build...

...is hard.  I'm not are really fast builder, either.  I don't like the Technic in the truck.  The Snowmobile is easier to build.  I enjoy the snowmobile.  It's really cool :P 7/10

The completed model

Yes!  This thing is awesome when it's complete.  The build provides you with a fairly large truck with a smacking tail.  The mouth doesn't open when the set is on the ground, though.  And the tail falls off sometimes.  But, it's still cool.  10/10

Summary

Overall, It's really good, and I reccommend it.  It's really cool.

author: NinjaGO_
title: Pretty Awesome!
review:
I have to say, at first I thought the new "Ninjago Rise of the Snakes" was going to be lame, but I bought some out of curiosity. After getting "Jay's Storm Fighter" I decided to get a few more for Christmas. I ended up buying this (mostly for Zane's snowmobile thing)and enjoying it.
The Fangpyre Truck makes a good addition to your Fangpyre army, and is the only way to get Zane's snowmobile in a box. This set comes with Fangtom and Fangdam (who's names are very confusing),Jay and Zane. You can't get an amazing amount of play-ability out of each of these alone,but together they are very fun. After all, I would recommend this to "Rise of the Snakes" fans. If you like original stuff, than I don't recommend this to you.

author: VBaskin2010
title: The Coldest Strike Of The Ice Claw Snowmobile By VBaskin2010
review:
When Zane realized that his Golden Shurikens can do more then he can imagine, and somehow his Shurikens has become a snowmobile and christen it the Ice Claw.

 

So when the fangpyres launches an attack on the good people of NinjaGo City, it's up to Zane and his Ice Claw snowmobile as they to go toboggan on their snakes' butt and get rid of them once and for all!
